lead_paragraph: In 1994, investigators concluded that Rwandan rebels who had stopped a genocide had killed tens of thousands themselves, but the report was not published.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: In 1994, investigators concluded that Rwandan rebels who had stopped a genocide had killed tens of thousands themselves, but the report was not published.

headline.print_headline: Dispute Over U.N. Report Evokes Rwandan Déjà Vu
headline.main: Dispute Over U.N. Report Evokes Rwandan Déjà Vu
headline.seo: Dispute Over U.N. Report Evokes Rwandan Déjà Vu
headline.sub: Echoes of 1994 Standoff in New Claims;

byline.original: By HOWARD W. FRENCH and JEFFREY GETTLEMAN
byline.contributor: Howard W. French reported from New York, and Jeffrey Gettleman from Nairobi, Kenya. Josh Kron contributed reporting from Kampala, Uganda.
